title: IHC's Strategic Participation in Make it in the Emirates 2025
description: IHC participated in the MIITE Forum 2025 with over 30 strategic deals, 12 new products, factory expansions, and facility launches across sectors such as clean energy, space tech, real estate, mining, AI and advanced technology. They contributed over AED 5.6 billion in industry commitments and forged 107 new partnership prospects, unveiling initiatives like UAE’s first AI marketplace SAIF and one of the world's largest energy storage deals through EPointZero.
tags: UAE Ministry of Industry and Advanced Technology
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: AI Marketplace Integration Partnerships
opportunities.description: Third-party AI solution providers can partner with the newly launched SAIF, UAE’s first AI marketplace, to offer specialized AI tools, data sets, or consulting services. This provides providers immediate access to a curated market, and enables SAIF to rapidly enrich its marketplace with diverse AI expertise.
roadmap_steps: Identify specific AI applications and solutions compatible with SAIF standards
Engage with SAIF technical and business teams for onboarding requirements
Develop integration plan and API connections
Complete legal and compliance vetting
Launch joint marketing efforts and customer support mechanisms

opportunities.title: Battery Technology and Materials Collaboration
opportunities.description: Battery technology manufacturers and materials science firms can collaborate on R&D and supply for large-scale energy storage projects such as EPointZero’s. This enables technology validation at scale, access to cutting-edge UAE projects, and improved supply chain resilience for energy storage deployments.
roadmap_steps: Conduct technical due diligence of EPointZero’s requirements
Identify novel battery chemistries or components for collaboration
Establish supply or R&D partnership agreements
Set up resource allocation for co-development and pilot testing
Plan scale-up and long-term supply contracts

opportunities.title: Smart Factory Tooling and Automation Partnerships
opportunities.description: Industrial automation and robotics firms can provide smart manufacturing equipment and technical consulting for IHC’s expanding factory and facility portfolio. This supports efficient, digitalized production processes in new or upgraded facilities across clean energy, mining, and advanced technology sectors.
roadmap_steps: Analyze the scope of IHC’s expansion and target facilities
Demonstrate relevant automation and digital manufacturing capabilities
Develop pilot projects or on-site demonstrations
Negotiate service agreements and support contracts
Implement solutions and train local workforce

opportunities.title: Mining Equipment Technology Provision
opportunities.description: Specialized mining equipment and geological exploration tech providers can offer advanced solutions for mineral extraction to support IHC and partners’ new mining deals. This addresses increasing demand for efficient, sustainable, and automated mining operations in the UAE and beyond.
roadmap_steps: Identify mineral resource types involved in new mining deals
Present advanced equipment and digital solutions to IHC and stakeholders
Offer pilot deployments or technology trials
Customize supply and maintenance agreements
Provide training and local support

opportunities.title: Clean Energy EPC & O&M Service Collaboration
opportunities.description: Clean energy project engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) as well as operations & maintenance (O&M) companies can cooperate with IHC’s planned expansions for solar, wind, or hybrid facilities in the UAE. By leveraging global expertise, these firms can speed up project delivery and ensure high uptime of assets.
roadmap_steps: Assess announced clean energy expansion sites and scopes
Develop tailored EPC or O&M proposals
Present past project credentials and local value add
Negotiate terms with IHC project managers
Onboard project teams and initiate service delivery

opportunities.title: Proptech Integrations in Real Estate Developments
opportunities.description: Property technology companies specializing in smart building systems, tenant apps, or energy management can offer their solutions to IHC and partner real estate expansions. This enhances asset value with digital amenities and sustainability features for UAE’s next-generation buildings.
roadmap_steps: Identify upcoming IHC and partner real estate projects
Engage with project developers for solution presentations
Demonstrate technology ROI and compatibility with UAE standards
Pilot integrations in selected developments
Negotiate full deployment and support contracts

opportunities.title: Space Tech Component Supplier Partnerships
opportunities.description: Electronic component manufacturers, sensors suppliers, and testing service providers can engage with IHC’s space technology initiatives as procurement partners or co-developers. Supporting local space tech manufacturing and R&D helps accelerate UAE’s ambitions in satellite and aerospace platforms.
roadmap_steps: Review requirements for IHC’s space tech and satellite initiatives
Identify critical components or testing needs
Engage in supplier qualification and R&D meetings
Provide samples or co-development proposals
Formalize supply or co-innovation agreements

title: Launch of UAE’s First Marketplace for AI Solutions - SAIF
description: IHC introduced SAIF, the world’s first native AI agent and the UAE's first marketplace for AI, enabling faster developer access to GPUs and large language models through a UAE-built platform, highlighting a significant advance in the AI ecosystem in the Emirates.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Integration of Industry-Specific AI Tools on SAIF Marketplace
opportunities.description: Companies in sectors such as healthcare, finance, or logistics can offer or integrate their industry-specific AI solutions (e.g., fraud detection, supply chain optimization, diagnostic imaging algorithms) into the SAIF marketplace. This would expand SAIF's portfolio and bring targeted value to UAE enterprises needing sector-tailored AI, while providing these companies wider access to the UAE’s lucrative market and GPU resources.
roadmap_steps: Identify industry AI tool alignment with SAIF platform
Contact SAIF business development team
Assess compliance requirements for UAE market
Develop integration and onboarding plan
Sign partnership and begin marketplace listing

opportunities.title: GPU Leasing and Hardware Services Partnership
opportunities.description: Hardware providers and cloud infrastructure companies can partner with SAIF to supply GPUs and lease compute resources directly to developers via the marketplace. This would address demand surges and provide a new sales channel within the emerging UAE AI ecosystem.
roadmap_steps: Evaluate SAIF's technical requirements for GPU integration
Build API or hardware listing compatible with SAIF
Initiate partnership discussions with SAIF
Negotiate SLAs and commercial terms
Launch GPU offering on the marketplace

opportunities.title: Translation and Localization AI Solutions for Arabic Market
opportunities.description: Language technology companies can offer advanced Arabic language models, translation APIs, and natural language processing tools as exclusive packages on SAIF, serving government, education, and business users across the region, leveraging the platform’s reach.
roadmap_steps: Develop Arabic-specific language AI tools
Localize documentation and output for UAE regulatory standards
Reach out to SAIF marketplace onboarding contacts
Prepare integration assets and marketing materials
Launch product with commercial support

opportunities.title: AI Model Training and Certification Programs Hosted on SAIF
opportunities.description: Educational service providers and AI training firms can collaborate with SAIF to deliver certified online courses and workshops for developers accessing the marketplace, boosting capacity-building in the UAE’s AI workforce as well as increasing visibility for their own learning programs.
roadmap_steps: Create tailored AI courses and certification programs
Align curricula with UAE’s AI ecosystem requirements
Propose partnership to SAIF platform administrators
Integrate training modules into SAIF user experience
Market offerings to developers and companies on the marketplace

title: EPointZero Signs 1 GWh Battery Deal with Enercap
description: EPointZero, IHC’s decarbonization platform, signed one of the largest global energy storage deals to date with Enercap by Apex Energy, involving 1 GWh battery storage technology to support the UAE's clean energy infrastructure.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Integration of Battery Storage into Smart Grid Solutions
opportunities.description: Companies specializing in smart grid technology can partner with EPointZero or infrastructure operators to integrate large-scale battery storage systems into advanced grid management platforms, enabling efficient demand response, load balancing, and grid stability as the UAE transitions to clean energy. This is realistic due to increasing smart city initiatives and the necessity to maximize clean energy infrastructure performance.
roadmap_steps: Analyze UAE energy storage and smart grid needs
Develop integration models for large-scale batteries
Identify relevant contact points at EPointZero
Draft technical collaboration proposal
Engage with grid operators and regulators for compliance
Launch joint pilot project for validation

opportunities.title: Battery Performance Testing and Monitoring Services
opportunities.description: Independent testing and monitoring companies can offer performance analytics and predictive maintenance services for the newly deployed 1 GWh battery systems. This ensures operational safety, efficiency, and reliability, while helping optimize lifetime value. The scale of deployment needs reliable third-party oversight, making this a highly viable opportunity.
roadmap_steps: Research performance monitoring needs for large-scale batteries
Develop tailored analytics and testing solutions
Identify decision-makers in EPointZero's operations
Present differentiators and prior experience
Secure agreements to provide ongoing performance monitoring
Coordinate deployment stage integration

opportunities.title: Supply of Battery Thermal Management Systems
opportunities.description: Specialized manufacturers can offer advanced battery thermal management solutions to ensure optimal operating temperatures and safety for the 1 GWh battery storage facility. Proper thermal regulation extends battery life and mitigates operational risks, a necessity in the UAE’s climate.
roadmap_steps: Identify specifications of battery storage units
Engineer suitable cooling or thermal solutions
Prepare technical proposals and simulations
Approach EPointZero and Enercap’s technology teams
Demonstrate cost savings and reliability enhancements
Initiate pilot tests within the UAE climate context

opportunities.title: Deployment of Fire Protection Technologies for Large Energy Storage
opportunities.description: Fire safety solution providers can collaborate to install advanced fire detection and suppression systems specific to high-capacity battery installations. With increased fire risk in large-scale lithium-based storage, such partnerships are crucial and increasingly required by insurance and regulation.
roadmap_steps: Study storage facility design and risk profile
Align offerings with UAE fire safety standards
Propose integrated detection and suppression solutions
Meet with storage operators and insurance partners
Install and test systems prior to full commission
Set up ongoing maintenance protocol

opportunities.title: Training and Workforce Development for Energy Storage Operations
opportunities.description: Educational and workforce training companies can provide specialized courses to upskill local engineers and technicians in battery management, safety, and maintenance. The scale of this deployment means a growing need for talent, which aligns with the UAE’s goals for local employment in clean technology.
roadmap_steps: Evaluate training requirements for new storage systems
Develop UAE-accredited training curriculum
Partner with local universities/vocational centers
Contact EPointZero HR and operations teams
Pilot training programs for new hires
Expand to ongoing certification and skill upgrades

title: Aldar Adopts Hydrogen-Based Steel Rebars for Net-Zero Mosque Construction
description: Aldar became the first regional developer to use hydrogen-based steel rebars from Emsteel in constructing Abu Dhabi’s first net-zero carbon mosque, advancing sustainable construction methods and material innovation in the region.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Smart Building Monitoring Integration for Net-Zero Religious Structures
opportunities.description: Companies specializing in smart building systems could collaborate with developers of net-zero religious sites to implement integrated energy monitoring, occupancy analytics, and predictive maintenance platforms. This is realistic, as it complements sustainable construction with ongoing energy and operational efficiency, ensuring the mosque consistently operates at net-zero or better carbon performance.
roadmap_steps: Research mosque energy requirements and current operational practices
Tailor smart building solutions for low-carbon religious buildings
Initiate contact with developers focusing on net-zero projects
Demonstrate effectiveness in similar sustainable structures
Offer pilot installation and monitoring services

opportunities.title: Decorative Eco-Friendly Materials Suppliers for Sustainable Religious Sites
opportunities.description: Suppliers of eco-friendly decorative materials (such as natural paints, recycled wood, and low-emission flooring) can partner with developers constructing sustainable mosques, filling the gap for interior finishes that align with net-zero goals. Demand for holistic sustainability in material selection is rising, making this opportunity both practical and timely.
roadmap_steps: Identify available sustainable decorative materials
Develop product portfolios tailored to religious/cultural sites
Assess compliance with regional building and cultural standards
Engage with real estate developers and architects focused on net-zero projects
Propose pilot areas or staged integration in upcoming constructions

opportunities.title: Hydrogen Production and Transport Optimization for Green Construction Supply Chains
opportunities.description: Specialized logistics or hydrogen technology companies can work with steel manufacturers supplying hydrogen-based products to optimize production, storage, and distribution of green hydrogen. Ensuring a stable, local supply chain is essential as adoption increases, making this collaboration valuable for scaling sustainable construction materials regionally.
roadmap_steps: Map current hydrogen supply chain utilized in steelmaking
Identify local production and storage facilities requirements
Partner with steel producers transitioning to hydrogen
Develop cost-effective transport and distribution strategies
Demonstrate benefits in terms of carbon reduction and supply reliability

title: Strategic Banking Partnership Between IHC and First Abu Dhabi Bank
description: IHC signed two major agreements with First Abu Dhabi Bank (FAB), appointing FAB as its exclusive house bank and launching the FAB Business App for financial integration and digital resilience across IHC’s portfolio companies.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Integration of ERP Solutions with FAB Business App
opportunities.description: Companies that develop enterprise resource planning (ERP) software can integrate their solutions with the FAB Business App to offer IHC's portfolio companies seamless financial operations, automated accounting, and real-time reporting. This collaboration is viable as it streamlines financial workflows, enhances data accuracy, and adds value to users already within the IHC and FAB ecosystem.
roadmap_steps: Identify compatibility of ERP solutions with FAB Business App API
Initiate partnerships discussions with FAB’s tech team
Develop integration modules or connectors
Pilot with select IHC portfolio companies
Install and provide user training
Gather feedback and iterate offering

opportunities.title: Cybersecurity Services for IHC-FAB Digital Ecosystem
opportunities.description: Cybersecurity firms can offer tailored security solutions to protect financial data and transactions within the FAB Business App and integrations used by IHC’s portfolio companies. This opportunity is practical due to the increased risk associated with centralizing banking operations and digital resilience requirements.
roadmap_steps: Analyze current cybersecurity posture in IHC-FAB ecosystem
Engage with IHC and FAB digital teams
Design custom cybersecurity framework
Propose managed security offerings
Support compliance and training
Monitor, review, and improve

opportunities.title: Payment Gateway Integration for IHC Portfolio Companies
opportunities.description: Developers and operators of payment gateways can integrate their services with FAB Business App, facilitating smoother processing of online payments for IHC’s diverse portfolio companies and their customers. This is realistic given the growing demand for digital payments across industries.
roadmap_steps: Review FAB Business App payment APIs
Contact FAB and IHC digital business teams
Develop API connectors for gateway integration
Test with sample transactions
Onboard IHC companies needing digital payments
Monitor and optimize payment flow

opportunities.title: Customizable Financial Analytics Dashboard Solutions
opportunities.description: Analytics providers can collaborate to create advanced, customizable dashboards for the FAB Business App, enabling IHC portfolio companies to gain deeper insights into their finances, spending patterns, and operational efficiency. Such collaborations improve decision-making and are feasible as digital finance analytics are in high demand.
roadmap_steps: Assess the current data capabilities of the FAB Business App
Initiate proposals with IHC and FAB for dashboard customization
Develop and test dashboards with sample datasets
Train portfolio companies on dashboard use
Iterate and roll out across the portfolio

opportunities.title: Onboarding and Training Service Providers for Digital Banking Tools
opportunities.description: Companies specializing in digital training and onboarding can provide tailored support to help IHC’s diverse portfolio companies maximize their use of the FAB Business App and digital banking services. Many companies require upskilling when adopting new financial platforms, making this a practical and needed collaboration.
roadmap_steps: Survey portfolio companies on current knowledge gaps
Create customized training materials for the FAB Business App
Collaborate with IHC HR and learning teams
Roll out phased onboarding sessions
Provide ongoing support and feedback loops

title: Enercap and ROX Motor Launch Partnership for UAE-Based Supercapacitor EV Systems
description: Enercap and ROX Motor formed a partnership to co-develop UAE-based supercapacitor systems for next-generation electric vehicles, supporting the growth of the UAE’s electric vehicle manufacturing ecosystem and low-carbon economy transition.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Integration of Smart Battery Management Systems with Supercapacitor EV Platforms
opportunities.description: Companies specializing in smart battery management systems can partner with supercapacitor EV system developers in the UAE to integrate advanced monitoring and optimization solutions, enhancing battery lifespan, safety, and performance in next-generation electric vehicles.
roadmap_steps: Identify supercapacitor EV platforms requiring management solutions
Propose tailored battery management technologies for integration
Reach out to relevant UAE-based EV manufacturers
Negotiate intellectual property and integration agreements
Co-develop and test integration prototypes

opportunities.title: Supplying Thermal Management Solutions for Supercapacitor-Based EVs
opportunities.description: Thermal management technology providers can collaborate with UAE supercapacitor EV manufacturers to supply cooling and heating solutions, ensuring optimal performance and safety of new energy storage systems in extreme local climates.
roadmap_steps: Analyze supercapacitor temperature sensitivity requirements
Design prototype cooling and heating modules
Present technical proposal to UAE EV manufacturers
Collaborate on adaptation and implementation
Conduct validation under local environmental conditions

opportunities.title: Localized Manufacturing of Supercapacitor Components for EV Supply Chains
opportunities.description: Component manufacturers can set up production facilities in the UAE to supply electrodes, separators, and casing materials for the growing supercapacitor-based EV supply chain, supporting regional manufacturing and reducing import dependencies.
roadmap_steps: Research local sourcing incentives and requirements
Assess demand for supercapacitor-specific components
Scout local industrial sites and workforce
Formulate partnerships with EV and supercapacitor firms
Establish pilot production and ensure quality certification

opportunities.title: EV Charging Infrastructure Firms Integrating Supercapacitor Fast-Charge Capabilities
opportunities.description: Charging infrastructure companies can develop and deploy ultra-fast charging stations compatible with supercapacitor-based EVs in the UAE, appealing to both private consumers and commercial fleets seeking rapid turnaround times.
roadmap_steps: Evaluate technical requirements for supercapacitor charging
Upgrade infrastructure to support rapid-charge protocols
Partner with EV manufacturers for compatibility validation
Acquire permissions for UAE site deployments
Launch pilot sites and gather user feedback

opportunities.title: Fleet Operators Piloting Supercapacitor EVs for Commercial Transport
opportunities.description: Commercial vehicle fleet operators (logistics, ride-hailing, public transport) can collaborate with UAE EV manufacturers to pilot supercapacitor-powered vehicles, leveraging faster charging and operational efficiency as competitive advantages.
roadmap_steps: Connect with UAE EV manufacturers for pilot opportunities
Define use cases and performance benchmarks
Deploy test vehicles in targeted operations
Monitor operational metrics and driver feedback
Report on efficiencies and scale adoption

opportunities.title: Renewable Energy Providers Collaborating on Direct Charging Solutions for Supercapacitor EVs
opportunities.description: Renewable energy companies can partner with UAE supercapacitor EV system providers to develop direct solar or wind-powered charging stations, maximizing sustainability impact and grid independence for electric mobility.
roadmap_steps: Map potential charging station sites near renewable sources
Design integration between renewable generation and EV chargers
Work with EV and infrastructure firms for compatibility
Secure regulatory approvals for operations
Deploy and monitor pilot projects

title: Orbitworks Unveils Altair Satellite Constellation
description: Orbitworks announced Altair, a 10-satellite, AI-enabled Earth observation constellation to be assembled and integrated in Abu Dhabi, emphasizing UAE's advancement in satellite manufacturing and space technology.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: High-Resolution Data Analytics for Agriculture
opportunities.description: Develop partnerships to utilize Altair's AI-enabled Earth observation data for precision agriculture analytics platforms, offering crop monitoring, soil moisture mapping, and yield prediction services for local and regional agritech companies. This is realistic due to the growing demand for satellite-derived insights in optimizing agricultural productivity and sustainability.
roadmap_steps: Identify agritech companies requiring Earth observation data
Establish contact and present potential use cases
Negotiate data sharing or licensing agreements
Integrate Altair satellite data into agriculture analytics platforms
Conduct pilot projects and collect feedback for improvement

opportunities.title: Insurance Risk Assessment Using Satellite Imagery
opportunities.description: Collaborate with insurance firms to provide AI-driven satellite data for assessing natural disaster risks, crop damage, and infrastructure coverage, improving claim accuracy and risk modeling. Insurance companies increasingly rely on real-time satellite data for faster and more transparent assessments, making this a viable partnership.
roadmap_steps: Identify insurance verticals benefiting from satellite data
Initiate dialogues with risk assessment divisions
Propose tailored data solutions leveraging Altair capabilities
Facilitate demonstration projects on disaster/claim scenarios
Train insurance staff on data interpretation and application

opportunities.title: Urban Planning with AI-powered Geospatial Intelligence
opportunities.description: Offer satellite-derived geospatial intelligence to urban planning and smart city solution providers for real-time infrastructure mapping, land use monitoring, and environmental impact assessments. The rapid urban growth in the UAE and the region creates strong drivers for this type of partnership.
roadmap_steps: Map out urban planning solution firms in target regions
Showcase capabilities of Altair’s real-time imaging and analytics
Develop collaborative pilot projects in strategic urban zones
Integrate geospatial data into urban development tools
Provide ongoing support for data updates and analytics

opportunities.title: Environmental Monitoring and Compliance
opportunities.description: Partner with environmental consultancies and agencies to use the Altair satellite constellation's AI-enabled sensors for monitoring pollution, tracking deforestation, and ensuring regulatory compliance. With growing environmental standards and enforcement, real-time satellite monitoring is increasingly necessary.
roadmap_steps: Identify agencies with environmental monitoring mandates
Initiate discussion on data requirements and delivery formats
Set up pilot monitoring and compliance tracking programs
Integrate satellite feeds with reporting and alerting platforms
Scale solutions regionally based on pilot success

opportunities.title: Telecommunications Infrastructure Planning and Optimization
opportunities.description: Work with telecom companies to use high-resolution Altair satellite data for planning and optimizing network infrastructure deployment, rural connectivity projects, and line-of-sight analyses. Precise satellite observation can facilitate better decision-making for network expansion in challenging environments.
roadmap_steps: Shortlist telecom operators with expansion objectives
Demonstrate value of high-resolution satellite mapping
Develop integration workflow for site selection and planning
Offer pilot analyses for targeted deployment zones
Formalize partnerships for ongoing data collaboration

title: EPointZero and IRH Partnership for Mining Decarbonization
description: EPointZero partnered with International Resources Holding (IRH) to drive full decarbonization across IRH’s global mining operations, supporting IHC’s commitment to sustainable industrial transformation at large scale.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Implementation of Advanced Carbon Capture Solutions in Mining Operations
opportunities.description: A company specializing in advanced carbon capture technology can offer tailored solutions to mining organizations undergoing decarbonization, enabling further reduction of operational emissions. These providers can integrate their systems into existing mining processes promoted by EPointZero and IRH, enhancing their decarbonization roadmap with next-generation emissions control.
roadmap_steps: Identify decision makers within IRH and EPointZero responsible for sustainability.
Develop a proposal highlighting technology benefits and compatibility with mining operations.
Arrange demonstration or pilot program on a mining site.
Align compliance standards with international mining best practices.
Negotiate commercial terms and sign collaborative agreement.

opportunities.title: Integration of Renewable Energy Solutions at Mining Sites
opportunities.description: Renewable energy firms can collaborate with miners to deploy on-site solar, wind, or hybrid power solutions, reducing reliance on carbon-intensive energy and aiding IRH's large-scale decarbonization efforts, creating reliable green energy for mining operations.
roadmap_steps: Assess energy requirements and current power sources of IRH mining operations.
Present feasibility studies targeting renewable integration.
Coordinate with EPointZero on site selection and technology compatibility.
Engage in pilot projects at select IRH mines.
Scale up deployment upon successfully meeting energy goals.

opportunities.title: Deployment of AI-Powered Decarbonization Monitoring Systems
opportunities.description: Companies offering AI-powered emissions monitoring and reporting platforms can partner with mining operators to provide continuous tracking, analytics, and optimization recommendations. Such tools offer transparency and efficiency, directly supporting decarbonization goals.
roadmap_steps: Research the current data monitoring systems used by IRH mining sites.
Demonstrate AI platform capabilities with case studies in mining.
Customize data integration modules for EPointZero's decarbonization framework.
Pilot the system in select operations to prove ROI.
Train on-site teams on data interpretation for continuous improvement.

opportunities.title: Provision of Sustainable Equipment and Electrified Mining Vehicles
opportunities.description: Manufacturers of electric or hydrogen-powered mining equipment can collaborate to retrofit or replace traditional, fossil-fuel-based machinery in IRH's mines, helping achieve rapid emissions reductions aligned with EPointZero's strategy.
roadmap_steps: Survey IRH's current equipment and identify electrification candidates.
Present case studies from similar mining fleet transitions.
Coordinate pilot projects for new vehicles on-site.
Build a phased transition plan to minimize operational disruption.
Support after-sales service and operator training.

opportunities.title: Collaborative R&D for On-Site Green Hydrogen Production
opportunities.description: Innovative cleantech firms with expertise in green hydrogen production can establish on-site pilot plants at mining locations, producing clean fuel for mine operations and contributing directly to large-scale decarbonization.
roadmap_steps: Identify geographical and technical feasibility at IRH mining sites.
Engage in joint R&D discussions with EPointZero and IRH sustainability leaders.
Secure investment and regulatory clearances for pilot plants.
Install demonstration-scale hydrogen generation units.
Monitor performance and expand via phased roll-outs.

title: NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia MoU to Boost Local Pipe Manufacturing
description: NMDC Energy signed a strategic MoU with Al Gharbia to accelerate pipeline production in the UAE, enhancing regional infrastructure support and strengthening local industrial capabilities in pipe manufacturing.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Advanced Coatings Supplier Partnership for Pipeline Longevity
opportunities.description: A company specializing in advanced anti-corrosion coatings or pipeline protection systems can collaborate with NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia to supply innovative coatings tailored to local UAE environmental conditions, extending pipeline lifespan and reducing maintenance costs.
roadmap_steps: Analyze regional environmental and operational needs for pipelines in the UAE
Develop or adapt pipeline coating systems suited for local conditions
Identify key decision-makers at NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia
Display product benefits (e.g., via demo or pilot)
Negotiate supply agreement or pilot project

opportunities.title: Industrial Automation Integration Provider for Pipe Manufacturing
opportunities.description: A company that develops industrial automation systems could offer solutions to NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia for optimizing pipe production lines, improving throughput, reducing labor costs, and enhancing quality control.
roadmap_steps: Assess current manufacturing processes at NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia
Identify automation gaps and propose bespoke solutions
Present ROI and efficiency gains through automation
Draft a pilot integration plan and timeline
Engage in on-site demonstration and staff training

opportunities.title: Supply Chain Logistics Service for Pipe Transport
opportunities.description: A specialized logistics company with expertise in heavy and oversized cargo can partner to manage the transport and distribution of large-scale pipes within the UAE and the wider region, ensuring timely and secure delivery from factory to deployment sites.
roadmap_steps: Map regional infrastructure and typical pipeline delivery requirements
Develop tailored transport and handling solutions for large-diameter pipes
Initiate contact with NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia procurement teams
Arrange site and factory visits to understand logistics needs
Propose long-term logistics and warehousing partnership

opportunities.title: Digital Twin Solutions Provider for Pipeline Asset Management
opportunities.description: A technology company offering digital twin platforms could collaborate to create virtual models of newly manufactured pipelines, enabling NMDC Energy and Al Gharbia to monitor asset performance, plan maintenance, and streamline operations.
roadmap_steps: Demonstrate digital twin case studies relevant to pipe infrastructure
Offer pilot digital twin implementation for select pipeline assets
Integrate platform with existing NMDC/Al Gharbia asset management systems
Train maintenance and operation staff on new system
Evaluate KPIs and expand solution scope

title: DCV Industries and Legrand Partnership for Next-Generation Data Centers
description: DCV Industries, part of Emircom, signed a strategic MoU with Legrand to provide integrated, high-performance infrastructure solutions for next-generation data centers, advancing digital infrastructure in the UAE.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

opportunities.title: Redundant Power Solutions for Data Centers
opportunities.description: Real estate power infrastructure providers can offer innovative redundant and backup power solutions tailored for the high-reliability needs of next-generation data centers being developed by DCV Industries and Legrand. This is realistic as modern data centers require robust, scalable power systems to prevent downtime and ensure operational continuity.
roadmap_steps: Research technical requirements for next-gen data centers
Identify DCV Industries and Legrand contacts responsible for infrastructure procurement
Develop proposals for integrated, scalable power and backup solutions
Present case studies or pilots to demonstrate reliability and ROI
Negotiate pilot deployment and service agreement

opportunities.title: AI-Driven Resource Optimization for Data Center Operations
opportunities.description: AI software solution providers can collaborate to implement resource optimization tools (e.g., smart cooling, predictive maintenance) for the new data centers, reducing energy consumption and operational costs. This is feasible, given the push for digitization and sustainability in UAE infrastructure projects.
roadmap_steps: Analyze operational challenges in high-performance data centers
Develop AI-driven models tailored to data center scenarios
Connect with DCV Industries' technical department
Propose proof-of-concept for implementation in upcoming facilities
Scale and support deployment upon success

opportunities.title: High-Security Access and Surveillance Solutions
opportunities.description: Security technology firms can offer advanced access control and surveillance systems, including biometric authentication, for safeguarding the infrastructure and data managed by these next-generation data centers. These facilities demand heightened security for both physical and digital assets.
roadmap_steps: Develop tailored security protocols for critical data infrastructure
Identify decision-makers for DCV Industries' data center projects
Demonstrate technology compliance with UAE regulations
Present integrated security solution proposals
Pilot implementation in a single facility, then scale

opportunities.title: Green Building Materials & Sustainable Construction
opportunities.description: Suppliers of sustainable construction materials can collaborate to supply eco-friendly building products for the construction and operation of these next-generation data centers, aligning with growing demand for greener digital infrastructure.
roadmap_steps: Audit material requirements in planned data center builds
Present green material certifications and benefits
Reach out to construction leads at DCV Industries and Legrand
Offer pilot projects or sample materials
Finalize supply agreements for upcoming builds

opportunities.title: Localized IT Talent Upskilling & Certification Programs
opportunities.description: Education and training companies can partner to offer upskilling and certification programs for IT professionals to support the operational needs of increasingly sophisticated data centers, ensuring sustained local workforce development and operational excellence.
roadmap_steps: Analyze skill gaps for upcoming data center technologies
Design targeted training programs and certifications
Engage with HR and operations teams at DCV Industries and Legrand
Pilot training cohorts for key technologies
Scale program based on feedback and operational integration
